sections.heading: marrying husband or wife of another.
sections.text: marrying husband or wife of another.

sections.heading: The provisions of s. 826.01 shall not extend to any person:(1)Who reasonably believes that the prior spouse is dead
sections.text: (2)Whose prior spouse has voluntarily deserted him or her and remained absent for the space of 3 years continuously, the party marrying again not knowing the other to be living within

sections.heading: Whoever knowingly marries or has sexual intercourse with a person to whom he or she is related by lineal consanguinity, or a brother, sister, uncle, aunt, nephew, or niece, commits incest, which constitutes a felony of the third degree, punishable as provided in s
